import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiserviceService } from '../service/service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movielist', templateUrl: './movielist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movielist.component.css'] }) export class MovielistComponent { baseUrl = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original"; movieList : any; constructor(private _apiservice: ApiserviceService) {} ngOnInit() { this._apiservice.getdata().subscribe(res => { this.movieList = res; this.movieList = this.movieList.results; this.movieList.forEach((ele : any) => { ele.poster_path = this.baseUrl + ele.poster_path; }) console.log(this.movieList); }) } }
